entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as descending the stone steps of the castle with Crabbe and Goyle.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as descending the stone steps of the castle with Malfoy and Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is described as descending the stone steps of the castle with Malfoy and Crabbe.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is mentioned as whispering and giggling behind Malfoy and his gang of Slytherin girls.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as being ignored by Pansy Parkinson.

entities.name: witch weekly
entities.description: The Witch Weekly article is mentioned as causing trouble for Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as waiting outside his cabin with a fresh supply of open crates at his feet.

entities.name: skrewt
entities.description: The skrewts are mentioned as hatching.

relationships.description: Harry is affected by the Witch Weekly article.
Pansy Parkinson questions Harry about his relationship status.
Pansy Parkinson is associated with a gang of Slytherin girls.
